name: Gourgeist
flavorText: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.

attacks.name: Eerie Voice
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spirit Scream
attacks.text: Put damage counters on both Active Pokémon until the remaining HP of each Pokémon is 10.
